import { useState } from 'react' import { GitBranch, Play, Square, RotateCcw, Clock, CheckCircle2, XCircle, Circle, ChevronDown, ChevronRight, ExternalLink, Search, Filter } from 'lucide-react' import { IconButton } from '@ui/components/atoms' import { StatusBadge, SectionHeader, ProviderIcon, ActionMenu, ActionItem } from '../shared' import { mockPipelines } from '../../mock-data' import type { Pipeline, PipelineRun, PipelineStage, PipelineStatus } from '../../types' function formatDuration(seconds?: number): string { if (!seconds) return '-' const mins = Math.floor(seconds / 60) const secs = seconds % 60 return `${mins}m ${secs}s` } function formatRelativeTime(dateStr?: string): string { if (!dateStr) return '-' const diff = Date.now() - new Date(dateStr).getTime() const mins = Math.floor(diff / 60000) const hours = Math.floor(diff / 3600000) if (hours > 0) return `${hours}h ago` if (mins > 0) return `${mins}m ago` return 'Just now' } function StageStatusIcon({ status }: { status: PipelineStatus }) { switch (status) { case 'success': return case 'failure': return case 'running': return case 'pending': return default: return } } function StagesTimeline({ stages }: { stages: PipelineStage[] }) { return (
{stages.map((stage, idx) => (
{stage.name}
{idx < stages.length - 1 && (
)}
))}
) } function PipelineCard({ pipeline }: { pipeline: Pipeline }) { const [expanded, setExpanded] = useState(false) const run = pipeline.lastRun return (
setExpanded(!expanded)} >
{pipeline.name} {run && }
{pipeline.repository} • {pipeline.branch}
e.stopPropagation()}> {run && (
#{run.number}
{formatDuration(run.duration)}
{formatRelativeTime(run.startedAt)}
)}
} size="sm" tooltip="Run pipeline" onClick={() => {}} /> } size="sm" tooltip="Open in browser" onClick={() => {}} /> } label="Run" onClick={() => {}} /> } label="Cancel" onClick={() => {}} /> } label="Retry" onClick={() => {}} />
{expanded && run && (
Latest Run {run.commit}

{run.commitMessage}

by {run.author}

Stages
Started: {formatRelativeTime(run.startedAt)}
{run.finishedAt &&
Finished: {formatRelativeTime(run.finishedAt)}
}
Duration: {formatDuration(run.duration)}
)}
) } export function PipelinesSection() { const [filter, setFilter] = useState('') const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('all') const filteredPipelines = mockPipelines.filter((p) => { const matchesSearch = filter ? p.name.toLowerCase().includes(filter.toLowerCase()) || p.repository.toLowerCase().includes(filter.toLowerCase()) : true const matchesStatus = statusFilter === 'all' || p.lastRun?.status === statusFilter return matchesSearch && matchesStatus }) return (
} onRefresh={() => {}} actions={
setFilter(e.target.value)} className="pl-7 pr-3 py-1 text-xs bg-[var(--bg-primary)] border border-[var(--border-primary)] rounded w-40 text-[var(--text-primary)] placeholder:text-[var(--text-muted)] focus:outline-none focus:border-[var(--accent-primary)]" />
} />
{filteredPipelines.map((pipeline) => ( ))}
) }
